org.csstudio.platform.internal.rightsmanagement
Class RightsManagementService

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.internal.rightsmanagement.RightsManagementService

public final class RightsManagementService
extends Object

The RightsManagementService provides the central CSS core functionalities for the management of Rights.

Author:
Kai Meyer & Torsten Witte & Alexander Will & Sven Wende & Joerg Rathlev

Method Detail

getInstance

public static RightsManagementService getInstance()
Return the only one instance of the RightsManagementService.

Returns:
The only one instance of the RightsManagementService.

hasRights

public boolean hasRights(User user,
                         String id)
Checks if the given user has the rights to perform the action with the given id. This method will return false if no rights are configured for the given action, i.e. by default, all actions can be executed by all non-anonymous users.

Parameters:
user - the user.
id - the action id.
Returns:
true if the user is permitted to perform the action, false otherwise.

hasRights

public boolean hasRights(User user,
                         String id,
                         boolean defaultPermission)
Checks if the given user has the rights to perform the action with the given id.

Parameters:
user - the user.
id - the action id.
defaultPermission - this value will be returned if no rights are configured for the given action. Note that if you pass false here, the action will be disabled if no authorization plug-in is loaded.
Returns:
true if the user is permitted to perform the action, false otherwise.

addRightsManagementListener

public void addRightsManagementListener(IRightsManagementListener listener)
Attach a rights management listener to the RightsManagementService.

Parameters:
listener - The listener.

removeListener

public void removeListener(IRightsManagementListener listener)
Detach a rights management listener from the RightsManagementService.

Parameters:
listener - The listener.

readRightsForUser

public void readRightsForUser(User user)
Reads the rights of the given user.

Parameters:
user - the user.

getAuthorizationProvider

public IAuthorizationProvider getAuthorizationProvider()
Returns the authorization provider.
